answers.answer: I am having the exact same problem, except the pressure on my right eye feels like it's coming from front, or it sort of on top of the front of the eye. It's like there's sleep in my eye that I can't see, it's slightly gluggy to open too.I was playing gameboy the other night in the dark (stupid i know) and when  I turned it off, there was a black fuzz over my right eye. Since then this pressure has developed and the vision is a little tiny bit blurry. The black fuzz went away that night.The main problem is it just feels different from my left eye.I'm worried! someone help!

You should check to see if the problem is your right eye or on the right side.  How long did this last?If on one side and symptoms lasted for 20 minutes or more, it may be migraine.See an ophthalmologist.Dr. O.

question: within the past few days I have developed a slight pressure with no pain behind my right eye and have noticed that the vision in that eye has become slightly blurred, I am very concerned, and am making an appt. with my eye doctor immediately.But to be honest I am very scared as all the web searches on other medical sites are using terms, like glaucoma, diabetes and stroke?this came on very sudden, after a emotional upset, is there possibility that it will go away just as sudden?
title: sudden vison discrepancy and pressure behind eye
